basics.name: Aadhithya Sankar
basics.label: Senior ML Engineer | Software Developer
basics.summary: I build complex ML pipelines, train models to see and fix problems. Informatics graduate from TUM.

work.name: Hasty GmbH | Berlin/Munich, Germany.
work.summary: design and development of our in-house scalable model inference platform, research and development of prompt-based segmentation and detection models and software engineering.

work.name: Untivue EMEA srl. | Munich, Germany.
work.summary: developed and trained AI models for Segmentation, Domain Transfer and Object Detection, created ML training pipelines using AWS SageMaker and developed core python packages to handle Image annotations and to interact with external Software apis.

work.name: deepc GmbH. | Munich, Germany.
work.summary: Research and Development of state-of-the-art Deep Learning approaches for segmentation, fracture detection, object detection problems. Software Engineering tasks in the areas of data processing and pipelining.
highlights: Scientific work which was accepted at the 2021 ICML AI for Healthcare Workshop.: https://arxiv.org/abs/2003.08469

publications.name: GLOWin: A Flow-based Invertible Generative Framework for Learning Disentangled Feature Representations in Medical Images
publications.summary: learning disentangled feature representations in the latent space for Brain MRI scans using Flow-based generative models.
